synopsis.text:
Corporation(Nikkatsu) in 1918, is actually a distinct film. This film is uniquely characterized by its pink tint, setting it apart from the black and white Urashima Tarou released in 1931.

In this captivating anime adaptation of a classic Japanese folk tale, we follow the journey of a compassionate fisherman who intervenes to save a sea turtle from torment at the hands of a group of children. Little does he know, this selfless act sets the stage for an extraordinary adventure beneath the waves. As a token of gratitude, the turtle invites the fisherman to a breathtaking underwater castle, marking the beginning of a grand undersea escapade filled with wonder and intrigue. Dive into the world of Urashima Taro and experience a timeless story of kindness and adventure like never before.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
